## Data Wrangling

```{r}
#Loading packages
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)

#Loading data
pricedata <- read.csv('pricessnapper.csv') 
  colnames(pricedata) <- tolower(colnames(pricedata))

fishdata <- read_excel('catch.xlsx') 
  colnames(fishdata) <- tolower(colnames(fishdata))

#Reshaping data
tunadata<- (fishdata) %>%
  select(-total) %>%
  gather('month', 'catch', jan:dec) %>%
  subset(region == 'Golfito', species == 'ATUN')
```
